name: Giant Goose
languages: understands Giant and Sylvan but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The goose makes one Beak attack and two Wing attacks.

actions.name: Beak
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Wing
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or have the {@condition prone} condition.

actions.name: Thunderous Honk {@recharge 5}
entries: The goose honks with ear-splitting volume. Each other creature within 30 feet of the goose must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 16 (3d10 damage) thunder damage and has the {@condition deafened} condition until the start of the goose's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. The honk can be heard within 300 feet.
